job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtMachine Learning EngineerampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtSignalPET is a new and innovative addition to the veterinary technology spaceampnbsp With our proprietary pure AI science we provide a second set of eyes on veterinary radiographs to assist veterinarians in diagnosing and treating companion animalsampnbsp We are offering a Machine Learning Engineer a life changing position on the SignalPET Engineering Teamampnbsp This opportunity allows handson practicing of deep learning models that will shape the future of veterinary medicineampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a Machine Learning ML engineer that is interested in a longterm position with SignalPETampnbsp This candidate should have a broad experience and knowledge in machinedeep learning and computer visionampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtThe responsibilities will includeltstronggtampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtBuild and enhance the companys AI tools solutions and platforms in order to enable AI based medical decision support systems at a scale to the growing community of SignalPET customersltligtltligtDevelop tools and applications by producing clean efficient codeltligtltligtConduct code reviews write unit integration and performance tests and perform validation and verification testsampnbsp to improve code qualityampnbspltligtltligtPerform advanced debugging to identify issues root cause and remediationltligtltligtInstrument and measure code to identify bottlenecks and improve performanceltligtltligtResearch and propose new techniques and methodologies to improve quality and efficiency of our platformsltligtltligtExhibit ownership of the software application tooling throughout SDLC including documentation and monitoringltligtltligtCollaborate with internal teams and customer support to improve product utilization and remediate issuesltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtKey QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtYou have strong coding skills in Python using scientific libraries like numpy scipyltligtltligtYou have practical experience training deep neural networks with one or more frameworks such as PyTorch Tensorflow or KerasltligtltligtYou are proficient in complex software systems able to apply AI techniques to solve real problems and able to deliver software of high build quality that is performant and easily supportableltligtltligtYou possess exceptional data management skills and the ability to perform complex modeling on dynamic data setsampnbspltligtltligtYou enjoy working with cross functional teams of driven people excited to solve challenging problemsltligtltligtYou believe that codereviews giving and asking for them are important to delivering a quality productltligtltligtYou care about bestpractices and evangelizing them within the teamltligtltligtYou can clearly convey your thoughts enjoy presenting what youve done and can cater your message to audiences both technical and nontechnicalltligtltligtYou respect and share our company values and operating principlesltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat can you expect as a SignalPET team memberltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe offer a competitive compensation and benefit package to all of our team members includingltpgtltulgtltligtMedical dental vision and prescription drug benefits for you and eligible dependentsltligtltligtPaid time offltligtltligtGuardian voluntary benefitsltligtltligt401K plan with an employer matchltligtltligtPossibility of Equity incentive packageltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltemgtWe are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity or expression pregnancy age national origin disability status genetic information protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltemgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
